context:
DOCUMENT 1:

Frank C. Carlucci was appointed to the position of Secretary of Defense by President Ronald Reagan in 1987 and served until 1989. ... 68th Secretary of the Treasury. Frank C. Carlucci | Secretary of Defense for Ronald Reagan Frank C. Carlucci - 16th Secretary of Defense for Ronald Reagan
Frank C. Carlucci
Share
Frank C. Carlucci 16th Secretary of Defense under RonaldÂ Reagan
The Secretary of Defense manages all the armed forces of the United States. The Army, Navy, Air Force, Marines, National Guard, and Reserve Forces are part of this Department.
Frank C. Carlucci was appointed to the position of Secretary of Defense by President Ronald Reagan in 1987 and served until 1989.
See all Cabinet Members
